page.title: 17EDUCATION BRIMSCOMBE STROUD
page.content: Brimscombe School was built in 1840 by DAVID RICARDO who also built the church.There were two large classrooms to which was added a smaller classroom in 1893.The only way into the school is on foot either up a steep path or down steps from the churchyard.Local children attended here until they were twelve then thirteen then fourteen. After 1947 children left before reaching twelve to go to a secondary modern school.There is a very small playground and no playing field.It has a HEAD TEACHER and two ASSISTAINT TEACHERS for its 3 classes.
